Create yours today.Get StartedI am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering,  Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur since March, 2021. Previously, I was a member of Secure Embedded Architecture Laboratory (SEAL),  Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur and have completed my Ph. D.  under the  supervision of  Prof. Debdeep Mukhopadhyay and Prof. Rajat Subhra Chakraborty. My broad area of research is  Hardware Security. To do good, we have to read good! ​Cryptography and Security Phone Publictions: (click below)My Laboratory Website:     SETTLORContact urbic@cse.iitk.ac.in urbic@iitk.ac.in urbi.ism@gmail.com ​Computer Hardware DesignOnline Meeting Link"The measure of what we are is what we do with what we have"~~Vince Lombardibottom of page
